PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02912012-03-15VAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Veterans Affairs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Veterans Health Care Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VETERANS HEALTH CARE REGULATIONS in order to continue to 1) provide financial support for long term care services in community beds to Overseas Service Veterans when the Veteran has been found eligible for a contract or departmental bed and none is available within a reasonable distance of their community and 2) reimburse health related travel costs incurred by Veterans eligible for treatment benefits from Veterans Affairs Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0042 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
AttachmentsAttachment
